Reykjavik Fashion Festival

Around February 2017 I got in touch with Serious Business. This agency with a fun name and ridiculously talented team was working on Reykjavikâ€™s Fashion Festival branding and website. I was convinced to jump in no matter what I would do just by checking out the slides and deck they sent me. I worked on a tool they used to explore and export a visual piece that represented one of the natural elements present in the branding: Wind. I kept their initial setup on processing mostly adding some performance and GUI. You can check the code on this gist.
